00024 namespace RDK2 { namespace Serialization { namespace Binary {
00025             
00026     void BinaryReader::expectPacket(char expected, std::string message)
00027         throw(ReadingException)
00028     {
00029         int8_t header = stream_read_int8();
00030         if(header!=expected) {
00031             throwIt(
00032                 message+": expected '" + packetName(expected) + "', read '" + packetName(header) + "'.");   
00033         }
00034     }
00035     
00036     bool BinaryReader::checkName(cstr name) throw(ReadingException) {
00037         int8_t next = stream_peek_int8(); 
00038         if(next == PACKET_HEADER_NAME) {
00039             BINARY_READER_DEBUG("Read name packet");
00040             stream_read_int8();
00041             enterContext(Context::ReadingName);
00042             context().name_readName = stream_read_string();
00043             if( (name != "") && (name!=context().name_readName ) ) {
00044                 throwIt(string("Name error: looking for ") + 
00045                     name + ", instead I read " + context().name_readName );
00046             }
00047             return true;
00048         } else {
00049             BINARY_READER_DEBUG("Next is not a name packet: " << packetName(next));
00050             return false;
00051         }
00052     }
00053     
00054     uint8_t BinaryReader::read_u8 (cstr name) throw(ReadingException){
00055         assertValidRead("read_u8");
00056         bool present = checkName(name);
00057         expectPacket(PACKET_HEADER_INT8, "Could not read int8 packet");
00058         int8_t value = stream_read_int8();
00059         if(present) exitContext();
00060         return *(uint8_t*)&value;
00061     }
00062     
00063     int8_t  BinaryReader::read_i8 (cstr name) throw(ReadingException){
00064         assertValidRead("read_i8");
00065         bool present = checkName(name);
00066         expectPacket(PACKET_HEADER_INT8, "Could not read int8 packet");
00067         int8_t value = stream_read_int8();
00068         if(present) exitContext();
00069         return value;
00070     }

00081     int32_t BinaryReader::read_i32(cstr name) throw(ReadingException){
00082         assertValidRead("read_i32");
00083         bool present = checkName(name);
00084         BINARY_READER_DEBUG("Reading int32, name is present = " << present);
00085         expectPacket(PACKET_HEADER_INT32, "Could not read int32 packet");
00086         int32_t value = stream_read_int32();    
00087         if(present) exitContext();
00088         return value;
00089     }

00108     
00109     void BinaryReader::readBytes(void** buf, size_t* n, cstr name) throw (ReadingException) {
00110         read_i8((int8_t**)buf, n, name);
00111     }
00112 
00113     void BinaryReader::read_u8(uint8_t** u, size_t* n, cstr name) throw (ReadingException) {
00114         read_i8((int8_t**)u, n, name);
00115     }
00116 
00117     void BinaryReader::read_i8(int8_t** i,    size_t* n, cstr name) throw(ReadingException) {
00118         assertValidRead("read_i8[");
00119         bool present = checkName(name);
00120         expectPacket(PACKET_HEADER_ARRAY_INT8, "Could not read byte array packet");
00121         *n = stream_read_int32();
00122         
00123         //if(*n==0) 
00124         //  throwIt("Zero length array?");
00125         
00126         int8_t * buffer = new int8_t[*n];
00127         for(int a=0;a<(int)*n;a++)
00128             buffer[a] = stream_read_int8();
00129         
00130         *i = buffer;
00131         if(present) exitContext();
00132     }
00133

00138         *n = stream_read_int32();
00139

00142

00145             buffer[a] = stream_read_int16();

00151     void BinaryReader::read_i32  (int32_t**i,   size_t* n, cstr name) throw(ReadingException) {
00152         assertValidRead("read_i32[");
00153         bool present = checkName(name);
00154         expectPacket(PACKET_HEADER_ARRAY_INT32, "Could not read int32 array packet");
00155         *n = stream_read_int32();
00156         
00157         //printf("N: %l ",*n);

00163             buffer[a] = stream_read_int32();

00205         
00206     std::string BinaryReader::readString(cstr name) throw(ReadingException) {
00207         assertValidRead("read_string");
00208         bool present = checkName(name);
00209         std::string s = stream_read_string();
00210         if(present) exitContext();
00211         return s;
00212     }
00213     
00214     std::string BinaryReader::stream_read_string() throw (ReadingException) {
00215         expectPacket(PACKET_HEADER_STRING, "Could not read string packet");
00216         int length = stream_read_int32();
00217         
00218         if(length==0) return "";
00219         
00220         std::string s; s.reserve(length);
00221         
00222         for(int a=0;a<(int)length;a++)
00223             s.push_back(stream_read_int8());
00224         
00225         BINARY_READER_DEBUG("stream: assembled string, length="<<s.length()<<" s="<<s);
00226         return s;
00227     }
